items.raw_desc: Babahordozó Ergobaby Omni Deluxe Mesh Soft Olive:The ERGOBABY Omni Deluxe Mesh Carrier delivers maximum comfort and exceptional breathability thanks to the innovative SoftFlex Mesh fabric. This ensures excellent air circulation throughout the day, even in warmer weather or when worn for longer periods. It allows four different carrying positions, on the stomach, on the side, on the back and facing away from the wearer. In addition, it grows with the child from birth, from approximately 3.2 kg, up to a weight of 20.4 kg, without the need for a newborn insert. The ergonomically shaped ERGOBABY Omni Deluxe Mesh seat supports healthy hip, spine and pelvic development and ensures a natural M-shaped leg position. Comfort for the wearer is ensured by a padded lumbar support with vents and the possibility of adjusting the lumbar belt from 45.4 to 145 cm. A porzsákos porszívó közvetlenül a készüléken található gombokkal vezérelhető.
